Method Detail

arrayToMap

public static <T> Map<T,T> arrayToMap(T[] list)
Turn a even length Array into a Map. The Array is expected to be in the format: { key1, value1, key2, value2, ... , keyN, valueN }

Type Parameters:
T -

toMap

public static <T> Map<String,T> toMap(org.apache.sling.commons.json.JSONObject json,
                                      Class<T> klass)
                           throws org.apache.sling.commons.json.JSONException
Converts a JSONObject to a simple Map. This will only work properly for JSONObjects of depth 1. Resulting map will be type'd where T is the type of the second parameter (klass)

Parameters:
json -
klass -
